# leading

**Type Property**

The leftmost or rightmost gravity area in a horizontally oriented stack view, based on the user interface language or the explicitly set user interface layout direction.

## Declaration

```swift
static var leading: NSStackView.Gravity { get }
```

## Discussion

For a left to right layout direction, the leading gravity area is on the left. Use only when the value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStackView/orientation] property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutOrientation/horizontal].

## Constants

- **NSStackView.Gravity.top**: The topmost gravity area in a vertically oriented stack view.
- **NSStackView.Gravity.center**: The center gravity area, regardless of stack view layout direction or user interface language.
- **NSStackView.Gravity.bottom**: The bottommost gravity area in a vertically oriented stack view.
- **trailing**: The leftmost or rightmost gravity area in a horizontally oriented stack view, based on the user interface language or the explicitly set user interface layout direction.
